statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_hours > 8;
SELECT id, employee_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY shift_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours FROM employee_schedule GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 40;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_hours > 8;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_employees FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY shift_start DESC;
SELECT AVG(work_hours) AS avg_work_hours FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE work_shift_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE work_shift_id = 2;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position IN ('Manager', 'Supervisor') AND work_shift_id = 1;

SELECT employee_name, department, shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN work_shifts ON employees.work_shift_id = work_shifts.work_shift_id WHERE position = 'Associate' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, position, total_hours FROM employees JOIN work_shifts ON employees.work_shift_id = work_shifts.work_shift_id WHERE total_hours > 8;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING total_employees > 3 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Schedule;
SELECT employee_id, date, start_time FROM Employee_Schedule WHERE shift_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Shift ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM Work_Hours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM Shift WHERE manager_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Schedule WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM Shift WHERE manager_id = 3
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM Work_Hours WHERE hours_worked > 8
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM Shift ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM Employee_Schedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_shift = 1;
SELECT shift_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM shifts;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id WHERE work_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, employee_position ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_position, employee_shift FROM employees LEFT JOIN schedules ON employees.employee_id = schedules.employee_id WHERE DATE(schedule_date) = '2023-10-15';

SELECT e.employee_name, s.shift_name, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time FROM employees e INNER JOIN schedules sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id INNER JOIN shifts s ON sc.shift_id = s.shift_id WHERE e.employee_position = 'Cashier';

SELECT e.employee_name, SUM(wh.hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM employees e LEFT JOIN work_hours wh ON e.employee_id = wh.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name ORDER BY total_hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM shift WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY end_time ASC;

SELECT employee.name, schedule.date, shift.location FROM employee JOIN schedule ON employee.employee_id = schedule.employee_id JOIN shift ON schedule.shift_id = shift.shift_id WHERE schedule.date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, description FROM warehouse_operations WHERE location = 'Main Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, email FROM employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM shift;
SELECT * FROM work_hours WHERE total_hours > 40;
